comment1: width of the band where continentalness gradually decreases
comment2: the higher this number, the more gradual the transition from unaffected terrain to endless ocean, however, too-high values may result in large regions with very few mountain biomes
comment_IMPORTANT: =*=*=*=*=*=IMPORTANT=*=*=*=*=*=: also change the falloff_radius_reciprocal when changing this value!
